project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of the construction and equipment of a new national primary teacher training college and the construction of and equipment of new educational facilities, boarding and staff accommodation in twelve secondary schools; site improvements, the addition of administrative and service facilities and building renovations of these schools; and the provision of 10 teacher fellowships.
